 2008-15172008-09-04FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Pension Plan Investment Board Act
PrecisReappointment of ROBERT M. ASTLEY, of Waterloo, Ontario, as a director of the board of directors of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a period ending October 26, 2011, effective September 15, 2008; and designation of ROBERT M. ASTLEY as Chairperson of the board of directors of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board to hold office during good behaviour, effective October 27, 2008.
AttachmentsAttachment
